name: EsCate
description:
EsCate is a game where you, the cat, have to escape from the labyritnh. You will need luck and a little bit of awareness to suceed. Reach the end before times runs out.

Hitting a door, an enemy or a trap will send you back to the beginning.

Escate is the result of our first Game Jam and first game ever for Chauvelu (Visuals and Musics/Sounds) and Me. We'll take any critisicm :)
